Task: reinforce_basement

Steps:
Step 1: stay_in_shelter npc

Descriptions:
- Make a plan. If a nuclear attack does happen, it won't be safe to venture outside for food — you should stay sheltered for at least 48 hours, preferably longer. Having food and medical supplies on-hand can put your mind at ease, and allow you to focus on other aspects of survival.

PDDL Actions:

(:action stay_in_shelter
    :parameters (?npc - person ?shelter - location)
    :precondition (and (outside ?npc) (safe ?shelter))
    :effect (and (inside ?npc ?shelter) (not (outside ?npc)))
)

(:action stock_food_supplies
    :parameters (?shelter - location ?food - item)
    :precondition (and (available ?food) (inside ?shelter))
    :effect (and (stocked ?shelter ?food) (not (available ?food)))
)

(:action stock_medical_supplies
    :parameters (?shelter - location ?medical_supplies - item)
    :precondition (and (available ?medical_supplies) (inside ?shelter))
    :effect (and (stocked ?shelter ?medical_supplies) (not (available ?medical_supplies)))
)

(:action make_plan
    :parameters (?npc - person ?plan - document)
    :precondition (and (safe ?npc) (not (has_plan ?npc)))
    :effect (and (has_plan ?npc ?plan))
)
